name: Magus Of Mistborrow
description:
You are an animal, chosen by a magus to accompany them through their life.

Sharing the life energy of the magus, you were traveling through the world finding the right place. In that place you both decided to call home, you focus on big quest the magus was given and their personal goal they want to achieve during their lifetime.

The time flows quite fast, the relations with the royals or nearby villagers may shift. The home itself can be crumbling or, on the contrary, enhanced by numerous staff of servants that fill all the orders of the magus. The servants themselves may be loyal or plotting against their master, following the orders of someone else.

Join the magus, help them to fulfill their goals. Or be an independent observer and watch the life of the magus to fail miserably.

The Magus of Mistborrow is a solo journaling RPG. To play the game you need a set of seven standard polyhedral dice: d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d20, and d%.
Assign the dice to five aspects of magus's life and try to enhance them to their top value.

There are various aspects that affect magus's life:

  • relation to the villagers
  • state of the home
  • loyalty of the servants
  • status of the given quest
  • status of personal lifetime goal

They all interact with each other, resulting in various outcomes. Let your imagination be free in interpretations, how those aspects interact with each other and what impact that will have on the life of magus.

Each year one of those aspects raises or lowers its fulfillment status, leading to the acomplishment of magus's goals or sudden end of their efforts.

Feel free to leave any form of commentary, positive, negative, constructive, or supportive!
